title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 9.6 - Relationship to convenience accounts
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 9.6 - Relationship to convenience accounts

State Regulations

If a basic banking account is structured as a convenience
account pursuant to the terms and conditions set forth in Part 15 of the

General Regulations of the Banking Board, then the requirements set forth in
section
14-f
of the

Banking Law shall be applicable only to the owner of the convenience
account. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
9.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
